title: Australian Fair Work Act Compliance Notes

keyComplianceRequirements.details: Fair Work Act requires minimum 3-hour shifts for casual employees in most hospitality awards
Minimum 10 hours rest between shifts as per Fair Work regulations
Full-time: 38 hours per week; Part-time: Less than 38 hours with regular roster; Casual: Variable hours with 25% loading
Saturday: 1.25-1.5x; Sunday: 1.5-2.0x; Public Holidays: 2.25-2.5x; Evening work (after 9 PM): Additional penalties may apply
Must not exceed 12 hours total span; Gap typically 2-3 hours maximum; Additional payment may be required
30 minutes unpaid meal break for shifts over 5 hours; 10 minute paid rest break for shifts over 4 hours
Minimum notice required for roster changes; Employee consent needed for certain changes; Compensation for cancelled shifts may apply
